title: MIXED PINCHO BOARD
description: daily variety of three bite-sized tapas
directions: Arrange a variety of cured meats and cheeses on a platter.
Add olives and seasonal fruit for garnish.
Serve with slices of artisan bread.

title: BARCELONA BOARD
description: today's selection of charcuterie, grainy mustard, house pickles, romesco, baguette
directions: Slice charcuterie and arrange on a platter.
Place small bowls of grainy mustard and romesco sauce on the side.
Add house pickles and sliced baguette to complete the board.

title: CHEESE BOARD
description: today's selection of cheeses, compote, almonds, baguette
directions: Arrange various cheeses on a platter.
Serve with fruit compote and almonds.
Add slices of baguette for pairing.

title: BODEGA BOARD
description: mixed board of charcuterie, cheese, salads, tortilla española, pickles, baguette
directions: Prepare tortilla española and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Arrange charcuterie, cheeses, and tortilla española on a large board.
Add salads, pickles, and slices of baguette around the board.

title: MANCHEGO CHEESE PLATE
description: 9 month aged Manchego cheese, roasted almonds, honey, baguette
directions: Slice Manchego cheese thinly.
Arrange cheese on a plate with a small bowl of honey.
Scatter roasted almonds around the cheese.
Serve with slices of baguette.

title: IBÉRICO DE BELLOTA PLATE
description: 24 month aged grass fed Ibérico leg, mustard, pickles, baguette
directions: Slice Ibérico ham thinly.
Arrange ham slices on a platter.
Serve with mustard, pickles, and sliced baguette.

title: MIXED OLIVES
directions: Mix assorted olives with herbs and a drizzle of olive oil.
Serve in a small bowl.

title: MARCONA ALMONDS
directions: Roast Marcona almonds lightly.
Season with sea salt and serve.

title: STUFFED PIQUILLO PEPPER
description: tuna, olive, caper, white anchovy
directions: Mix tuna with chopped olives and capers.
Stuff the piquillo peppers with the tuna mixture.
Top each pepper with a piece of white anchovy.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: SEARED ALBACORE TUNA
description: spice crusted, lightly pickled green beans, roasted tomatoes, sundried tapenade, egg mimosa
directions: Coat tuna steaks in spice mix and sear until desired doneness.
Lightly pickle green beans.
Prepare egg mimosa and chop finely.
Assemble dish with seared tuna, pickled beans, roasted tomatoes, and a dollop of sundried tapenade.
Garnish with egg mimosa.

title: CEVICHE
description: scallop and cod, poblano relish, lime leaf, cilantro, potato chips
directions: Dice scallops and cod, and marinate in citrus juice with chopped poblano peppers and lime leaves.
Serve chilled, garnished with cilantro and accompanied by potato chips.

title: BEEF CARPACCIO
description: sherry-soy vinaigrette, smoked mushroom aïoli, jicama remoulade, garlic chips, greens, baguette
directions: Arrange thinly sliced beef on a plate.
Drizzle with sherry-soy vinaigrette.
Top with smoked mushroom aïoli and jicama remoulade.
Sprinkle garlic chips and serve with mixed greens and slices of baguette.

title: TORTILLA ESPAÑOLA
description: Spanish omelette, potato, onion, egg, romesco sauce, chili aioli, house pickles
directions: Slice potatoes and onions and fry until golden.
Beat eggs and pour over potatoes and onions, cooking until set.
Serve with romesco sauce, chili aioli, and house pickles.

title: CHICKEN LIVER MOUSSE
description: sherry aïoli, cranberry gelée, house pickles, whole grain mustard, baguette
directions: Prepare mousse from chicken livers and season with sherry aïoli.
Refrigerate until set.
Serve topped with cranberry gelée, accompanied by house pickles, whole grain mustard, and slices of baguette.

title: BOQUERONES
description: cured & marinated white anchovies, chili oil, cherry tomatoes, baguette
directions: Marinate white anchovies in chili oil.
Arrange on a plate with cherry tomatoes.
Serve with slices of baguette.

title: SEAFOOD CONSERVAS
description: fine seafood carefully harvested and tinned by hand on the coast of Galicia
directions: Select various tinned seafood such as mussels, clams, and sardines.
Arrange seafood in a serving dish and drizzle with olive oil and herbs.

title: ALBÓNDIGAS PORK MEATBALLS
description: tomato sauce, grated manchego cheese, focaccia bread
directions: Mix ground pork with breadcrumbs and spices, form into meatballs.
Brown meatballs, then simmer in tomato sauce.
Serve topped with grated manchego cheese and accompanied by slices of focaccia bread.

title: ROASTED SQUASH & TOMATO
description: tomato and pumpkin seed pesto, chili oil, blistered cucumber
directions: Roast squash and tomatoes.
Prepare pumpkin seed pesto.
Toss blistered cucumbers in chili oil.
Combine all ingredients and serve.

title: JAMÓN BOCADILLO
description: shaved prosciutto ham sandwich, fig jam, dijon mayonnaise, melted brie cheese
directions: Layer prosciutto ham, fig jam, and dijon mayonnaise on sandwich bread.
Top with slices of brie cheese.
Grill until cheese is melted and bread is toasted.

title: CAPICOLA BOCADILLO
description: sliced chili rubbed pork collar sandwich, giardiniera, greens
directions: Rub capicola with chili and cook until done.
Slice and layer on sandwich bread with giardiniera and mixed greens.
Serve immediately.

title: ROASTED CARROTS
description: sumac tahini, dukkah, pea tendrils, puffed wild rice
directions: Roast carrots with a drizzle of olive oil until tender.
Drizzle with sumac tahini sauce.
Sprinkle with dukkah.
Garnish with pea tendrils and serve with a side of puffed wild rice.

title: SAUSAGE AND CLAMS
description: housemade fennel sausage, butter beans, herb oil, focaccia bread
directions: Cook fennel sausage until browned.
Add clams and cover until they open.
Mix in butter beans and drizzle with herb oil.
Serve with slices of focaccia bread.

title: PATATAS BRAVAS
description: roasted potatoes, spicy tomato sauce, garlic aioli
directions: Roast potatoes until golden and crispy.
Serve topped with spicy tomato sauce.
Drizzle garlic aioli over the top.

title: PATATAS SUPREMAS
description: roasted potatoes, aioli, jamón, soft boiled egg, shaved manchego
directions: Roast potatoes until crispy.
Top with slices of jamón and a soft boiled egg.
Sprinkle with shaved manchego and drizzle with aioli.

title: GAMBAS AL AJILLO
description: prawns, garlic chili butter, focaccia bread
directions: Sauté prawns in garlic chili butter until pink and cooked through.
Serve hot with slices of focaccia bread for dipping.

title: SPANISH CHORIZO
description: oven roasted, lime, whole grain mustard, greens
directions: Roast slices of Spanish chorizo until crisp.
Serve with a squeeze of lime and a dollop of whole grain mustard on a bed of mixed greens.

title: STEWED MUSHROOMS & LENTILS
description: green kale, sherry vinaigrette, add chorizo $5
directions: Stew mushrooms and lentils until tender.
Stir in chopped green kale and cook until wilted.
Dress with sherry vinaigrette and add chorizo if desired.

title: BEETS AND MOLE
description: warm roasted beets, house-made mole, fresh mozzarella, rye crisp
directions: Roast beets until tender.
Top with mole sauce and slices of fresh mozzarella.
Serve with rye crisps.

title: SLICED BAGUETTE OR HOUSE-MADE FOCACCIA BREAD
description: oil & vinegar or butter 1.00
directions: Slice baguette or focaccia bread.
Serve with options of olive oil & vinegar or butter for dipping.

title: GLUTEN FRIENDLY BREAD OR CRACKERS
directions: Provide a selection of gluten-free bread and crackers.

title: CHOCOLATE DUO
description: malted chocolate pudding, white chocolate
directions: Prepare malted chocolate pudding with dark chocolate, malt powder, milk, and sugar.
Chill until set.
Serve with shavings of white chocolate on top.

title: CREMA CATALANA
description: cinnamon, orange brûlée, stewed peaches
directions: Mix cream, sugar, eggs, cinnamon, and orange zest and cook until thick.
Chill and then brûlée the top with sugar.
Serve with stewed peaches.

title: BASQUE CHEESECAKE
description: fruit compote, white chocolate
directions: Prepare Basque cheesecake batter with cream cheese, eggs, sugar, and vanilla.
Bake until burnt at the edges.
Cool and serve with fruit compote and grated white chocolate.

title: HOUSE-MADE SORBET
description: ask your server for today's flavours
directions: Purée seasonal fruits with sugar and lemon juice.
Freeze in an ice cream maker until smooth and firm.
Serve chilled with fresh fruit garnish.
